yEX 10d (yard-exit)
10d 8d (yard-Shadyside)
8d 7d Shadyside::D
7d 1d "(Shadyside-Herron Ave.)"
1d 17d "Herron Ave.::D"
17d 21d "(Herron Ave.-Swissville)"
21d 22d Swissville::D
22d 25d "(Swissville-Penn Station)"
25u 22u "(Penn Station-Swissville)"
22u 21u Swissville::U
21u 17u "(Swissville-Herron Ave.)"
17u 16u "Herron Ave.::U"
16u 6u "(Herron Ave.-Shadyside)"
6u 7u Shadyside::U
7u 10u (Shadyside-yard)
10u yENT (yard-enter)
10u 1d "(yard-Herron Ave.)"
